commit.message:
c_locale.h: Do not include <cstdarg>, use builtins.

2007-05-21  Paolo Carlini  <pcarlini@suse.de>

	* config/locale/gnu/c_locale.h: Do not include <cstdarg>, use builtins.
	* config/locale/generic/c_locale.h: Likewise.

From-SVN: r124907

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@
+2007-05-21  Paolo Carlini  <pcarlini@suse.de>
+
+	* config/locale/gnu/c_locale.h: Do not include <cstdarg>, use builtins.
+	* config/locale/generic/c_locale.h: Likewise.
+
 2007-05-21  Paolo Carlini  <pcarlini@suse.de>
 
 	PR libstdc++/31621
